metadata.name: Generate Design
metadata.shortDescription: Transform EARS specification into layered system design
metadata.description: Converts formal EARS requirements into structured multi-layer architecture designs using proven patterns like data collection → validation → interpretation → querying. Produces comprehensive design documentation with component definitions, data flows, and task breakdowns.
objectives: Transform EARS specifications into layered system architectures
Apply design patterns based on system type (data pipeline, service, CLI, etc.)
Generate component definitions and layer responsibilities
Document data flows and interfaces between layers
Create task breakdown structure from design
metadata.author: OLAF Framework Core Team

prompts.description: Main prompt that transforms EARS spec to layered design
